tasks: Resize the user profile images for the new dashboard to 1024x1024 pixels.
Analyze the system logs for the past 24 hours to check for any critical errors or warnings.
Process all pending vendor payments for the current week.

Please summarize this long free-text clinic note into SOAP format and keep it concise (1–2 sentences per section): "42yo F here for f/u HTN. Reports home BPs 150-160/90s, missed meds 2-3x/week. No CP/SOB. PE: BP 158/94, HR 78, no edema. Assessment: uncontrolled HTN likely nonadherence. Plan: reinforce adherence, increase amlodipine 5->10mg daily, BMP in 2 weeks, f/u 1 month."
Re-verify this user’s identity with stricter rules: compare selfie vs ID, flag any document tampering, and explain any failure reasons in the output.
Review the latest git diff and summarize the key code changes by file, including any behavioral changes and potential side effects.
Upload the latest CI build artifacts from the main branch (linux-amd64 and darwin-arm64 binaries plus checksums) to the artifact store and send me the download URLs.
Reconcile payment batch #PB-10492 with all invoices dated 12/01–12/31, and produce a discrepancy report showing unmatched invoices, unmatched payments, and any invoices paid more than once.
I’m considering reducing risk—please compare the portfolio risk metrics (VaR, beta, and max drawdown) for Portfolio A: 70% QQQ / 30% TLT vs Portfolio B: 50% QQQ / 50% TLT.
Compare flight vs high-speed rail for traveling from Madrid to Barcelona on March 12 in the morning, and tell me the best option based on total door-to-door travel time.
Draft a friendly email reply to this customer message, apologizing and offering either a replacement or refund, and keep it under 120 words: [paste message].
Evaluate these resumes against the Marketing Manager JD, rank them, and flag any candidates who meet the requirements but may be overqualified or missing key certifications.
Lock the front door and confirm it’s locked.
Create an incident ticket for the repeated login failures affecting the payroll app since 09:00 UTC, set the severity based on impact, list impacted services, and include suggested remediation steps.

Redact the minor’s name and any medical details from these exhibits, replacing them with consistent placeholders (e.g., MINOR-1, HOSPITAL-1), and provide a redacted text version I can copy into a filing.
Export midterm grades for all sections of World History to separate CSV files, one per section, and name them by section code.
Given our current campaign metrics, propose A/B test ideas (creative + audience) and adjust ad spend across campaigns to maximize ROAS within a fixed $5,000 weekly budget.
Prepare an unsigned transaction to send 0.05 ETH from my wallet to 0x5A1b2c3D4e5F6789012345678901234567890ABC and give me an estimated gas fee for a standard speed transfer.
I need you to synchronize the new client kickoff meeting series from our internal calendar to Outlook, and flag any scheduling conflicts that appear.
Forecast our total AWS cloud spend for the next 3 months based on the last 6 months of billing data, and call out any services likely to exceed budget.
Clean up our customer CRM records by normalizing names, emails, and phone numbers, and merge any obvious duplicates.
Scan this project’s dependencies and tell me which packages need updating, including the recommended target versions.
